data.author: Zephyris

changelog.release_notes: Added Pebble Round (Chalk) support, updated the arc drawing on colour Pebbles (Basalt & Chalk) for smoother curves and animation, added a configuration option to have flat arc caps instead of round caps on colour Pebbles (Basalt & Chalk) and added a configuration option to display the current time digitally too, for easier reading.
Optimised arc drawing methods to improve arc smoothness while maintaining a smooth animation (thanks to /u/dezign999 for the motivation).
Fix a cryptic error that prevented loading onto original pebbles, but only via the app store.
Added support for black and white Pebbles.

data.description: A colourful interpretation of the classic arc watchface design, with a Pebble Time-style loading animation and dynamic colour schemes. Colour schemes, whether or not to show the second hand, whether the arcs have flat or curved caps, and whether or not to show the time digitally can be customised.

latest_release.release_notes: Added Pebble Round (Chalk) support, updated the arc drawing on colour Pebbles (Basalt & Chalk) for smoother curves and animation, added a configuration option to have flat arc caps instead of round caps on colour Pebbles (Basalt & Chalk) and added a configuration option to display the current time digitally too, for easier reading.

data.title: Arcturus
